com.Cardinal.CommandPackage.Handle.Command

Class CommandRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Cardinal.CommandPackage.Handle.Command.CommandRegistry

  • public class CommandRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used for mapping ICommand objects.
    Author:
    Cardinal System

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandRegistry

        public CommandRegistry()
        Constructs a new CommandRegistry with no mappings.

      • CommandRegistry

        public CommandRegistry(ICommand... commands)
                throws CommandRegisterException
        Constructs a new CommandRegistry and maps the given commands.
        Parameters:
        commands - the commands to map.
        Throws:
        CommandRegisterException - thrown if there an problem registering any commands.

    • Method Detail

      • registerCommand

        public void registerCommand(ICommand command)
                     throws CommandRegisterException
        Maps the given command into the registry.
        Parameters:
        command - the command to map/register.
        Throws:
        CommandRegisterException - Thrown (1) If a command with the same name is already mapped, (2) if the command has more than one array argument type, (3) if the command has more than one optional argument, or (4) if the command has both optional and array argument types.
        See Also:
        unregisterCommand(ICommand)

      • registerCommands

        public void registerCommands(ICommand... commands)
                      throws CommandRegisterException
        Maps the given commands into the registry.
        Parameters:
        commands - the commands to map/register.
        Throws:
        CommandRegisterException - thrown if there an problem registering the command.
        See Also:
        registerCommand(ICommand), unregisterCommands(ICommand...)

      • registerAlias

        public void registerAlias(ICommand command,
                          java.lang.String alias)
                   throws CommandRegisterException
        Registers an alias for the given command. This will allows user to use the given alias to invoke the given command.
        Parameters:
        command - the command.
        alias - the alias.
        Throws:
        CommandRegisterException - thrown if the alias is already registered or if it matches a command name.
        See Also:
        registerAlias(String, String)

      • registerAlias

        public void registerAlias(java.lang.String command,
                          java.lang.String alias)
                   throws CommandRegisterException
        Registers an alias for the given command. This will allow users to use the given alias to invoke the given command.
        Parameters:
        command - the command name.
        alias - the alias.
        Throws:
        CommandRegisterException - thrown if the alias is already registered or if there no command with the given name.
        See Also:
        registerAlias(ICommand, String)

      • registerAliases

        public void registerAliases(ICommand command,
                            java.lang.String... aliases)
                     throws CommandRegisterException
        Registers alias for the given command. This will allow users to use any of the given aliases to invoke the given command.
        Parameters:
        command - the command.
        aliases - the aliases.
        Throws:
        CommandRegisterException - thrown if any of the given aliases are already registered.

      • registerAliases

        public void registerAliases(java.lang.String command,
                            java.lang.String... aliases)
                     throws CommandRegisterException
        Registers alias for the given command. This will allow users to use any of the given aliases to invoke the given command.
        Parameters:
        command - the command name.
        aliases - the aliases.
        Throws:
        CommandRegisterException - thrown if (1) any of the given aliases are already registered or (2) if there is no command with the given name.

      • unregisterAlias

        public java.lang.String unregisterAlias(java.lang.String alias)
        Unregisters the given command alias.
        Parameters:
        alias - the alias.
        Returns:
        the command name previously associated with the given alias.

      • unregisterAliases

        public java.lang.String[] unregisterAliases(java.lang.String... aliases)
        Unregisters the given command aliases.
        Parameters:
        aliases - the aliases.
        Returns:
        the aliases that were not already registered.

      • unregisterCommand

        public ICommand unregisterCommand(ICommand command)
        Removes the given command from the registry.
        Parameters:
        command - the command to remove.
        Returns:
        the command removed.
        See Also:
        unregisterCommand(String), registerCommand(ICommand)

      • unregisterCommand

        public ICommand unregisterCommand(java.lang.String name)
        Removes the command with the given name from the registry.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the command to remove.
        Returns:
        the command removed.
        See Also:
        unregisterCommand(ICommand), registerCommand(ICommand)

      • unregisterCommands

        public ICommand[] unregisterCommands(ICommand... commands)
        Removes the given commands from the registry.
        Parameters:
        commands - the commands to remove.
        Returns:
        the commands that were not already registered.
        See Also:
        unregisterCommand(ICommand), unregisterCommand(String), registerCommands(ICommand...)

      • unregisterCommands

        public java.lang.String[] unregisterCommands(java.lang.String... names)
        Removes the commands with the given names from the registry.
        Parameters:
        names - the names of the commands to remove.
        Returns:
        the command names that were not already registered.
        See Also:
        unregisterCommand(String), registerCommands(ICommand...)

      • getCommand

        public ICommand getCommand(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the command with the given name. If there is no command with a matching name, then the aliases mappings will be checked for a match. If there no matching alias, then this will return null.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the command.
        Returns:
        the command with the given name, or null.
        See Also:
        registerCommand(ICommand), unregisterCommand(String)

      • getCommands

        public ICommand[] getCommands(java.lang.String... names)
        Gets the commands with the given names. If any of the names are not in the command mappings, then those indices will be null
        Parameters:
        names - the names of the commands.
        Returns:
        an array of commands.

      • getCommands

        public java.util.Collection<ICommand> getCommands()
        Gets all the registered commands.
        Returns:
        the registered commands.

        Returns:
